name: Dicey Towers (GMTK Jam 2022)
description:
The session has only just started and your character is already dead. Well, that sucks, but you can't just leave, after all your friends are still playing. So what does the common TTRPG nerd do to pass the time? Well, build dice towers of course.
How many dice can you stack on top of your dice tray before it all falls apart and you make a huge mess?
